channel.title: RE: Question: How do you make shops in a 525? Trying to get answer for 3 weeks!
channel.description:
[quote="ghostly150, post:1, topic:355705"][quote author=ghostly150 link=topic=451876.msg3311603#msg3311603 date=1282012986] I found this 525 source and client I want to use but it didn't have any shops in it and I am fairly new to 525's. I was wondering if anyone could point me to a tutorial or something...? I've spent at least two days altogether searching (not 2 days straight but its just to show the point). So could anyone please help with this? It would help a LOT! :) ;)
Thank you, Ghostly150
Anyone? PLEASE!?!?!?!? [/quote]
Can [i]ANYONE[/i] please help me?!?!?!?!?[/quote]
I AM GETTING VERY FRUSTRATED AT THIS NO ONE CAN HELP!!!!!!!! PLEASE HELP I NEEEEEEED HELP!

item.title: RE: Question: How do you make shops in a 525? Trying to get answer for 3 weeks!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I HAVE searched everywhere and that includes “Search button” amd many many other places. Please tell me how to add the shops!!! It’s all i ask please please pleeeeaaaasssseeee!!!

Read full topic

Thank you,
